retrieveVideoForm.pasteYourVideoUrlYoutu:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the video URL input field
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Retrieve Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the user needs to input a video URL for retrieval
**Technical Context**: Standard text input label; specifically mentions YouTube.
**Current English**: "PASTE YOUR VIDEO URL (YOUTUBE)"
retrieveVideoForm.thisLinkIsInvalidPleas:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message for an invalid video URL
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Retrieve Video Form (below the video URL input)
**When Users See This**: When the user enters a video URL that cannot be verified or is in an incorrect format
**Technical Context**: Displays when `retrievalError` is true
**Current English**: "This link is invalid, please check it again!"
retrieveVideoForm.pasteYourVideoHere:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the video URL input field
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Retrieve Video Form (within the video URL input)
**When Users See This**: When the video URL input field is empty
**Technical Context**: Placeholder for a text input
**Current English**: "Paste your video here"
retrieveVideoForm.retrieveVideo:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate video retrieval
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Retrieve Video Form (submit button)
**When Users See This**: After pasting a video URL, to proceed with verification and retrieval
**Technical Context**: Submit button for the video retrieval form
**Current English**: "Retrieve video"
